name: Metta Machine
description:
Send love beams to lost souls and dance your ass off in this vertical labyrinth. 

Runs best on Quest 2 VR (use something like SideQuest to upload to your headset). 

Please report any bugs/feedback in the comments or @ mention us on Twitter. Thank you for playing!

The Game

Metta Machine was created by Ben Pence (twitter) in bits and pieces over Summer 2022. Special thanks to Tasshin Fogleman for inspiring the game, as well as the program leaders and participants in Give Your Gift  for encouraging me to finish it.

Music: City in the Night by BETTOGH

Font: Clip by Martín Argűello
